OOC: This shall also not be privatem because I plan no insults. JP, tell me
this, if you had to kill yourself, I am not saying if you WANTED to, but if
you HAD to kill yourself, what would you use? Pills? DAMN STRAIGHT! What
else would you use? Guns? Knives? You'd use FREAKING PILLS! I'm trying my
best to keep my patience, here, and not insult you, but what you said was
plain wrong...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Robert Dahl" <rdahl@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 9:22 PM
Subject: Re: Suicide King


> I am not gonna make this private because I have something I have to get
off
> my chest. JP, what is your major malfunction?  Why can't you be courteous?
> If this gets me kicked out of the game, so be it. You are a sadistic
bully.
> I've really enjoyed playing this game, except for when it comes to dealing
> with you. Playing with people like Roborick and Yanshosh, and reading
posts
> by Kinger and Airly is enjoyable. But you are a waist of my time. Why
would
> he do this to get out of a game, instead of just saying "I Quit" Even if
it
> is a trick (which I dont believe it is, because I have more faith in
> people) isnt it safer to just be polite? Just from reading your posts, I
> knew you would do some kind of sick twisted thing like this. I feel for
> you, because you obviously dont have any redeeming qualities. Go ahead and
> insult me back, with your elementary bashing, and crude post. Nothing you
> say matters, cause everyone on this chat is levels above you when it comes
> to dealing with people. Go see a psychiatrist, because you are a royaly
> screwed up person. Get a life. Sorry everybody, but I have no patience for
> discusting scum.
>
